roleset.name: hostile behavior, actively hostile

example.name: aggression-n: Arg0
example.text: Where 's the public outcry about Russian veto and unilateralism -LRB- a criticism routinely employed - rightly -against the United States when it vetoes resolutions on Israeliaggression -RRB- ?

example.name: aggression-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: Jan Faull, M.Ed., answers a parent's question about a firstborn toddler's aggression toward the new baby.

example.name: aggression-n: cause
example.text: Some dogs may only show aggression over one specific object and nothing else.
example.arg: over one specific object and nothing else.

example.name: aggressive-j: All args
example.text: The client acknowledged that the dog was aggressive towards his wife.

roleset.note: AGGRESSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from aggression.01-n)
AGGRESSIVE-J NOTES: Based on BOLT P01. (from aggressive.01-j)

roleset.name: fast-growing

example.name: aggression-n: Arg0
example.text: The cancer's aggression is partly a result of its location.

example.name: aggressive-j
example.text: My Sister's cancer was aggressive in nature, continuing to spread irrespective of treatment.

example.name: aggressive-j
example.text: Loan growth was aggressive, significant, or faster than anticipated.

roleset.note: AGGRESSION-N NOTES: Split off from the original 'aggression' roleset by Julia for unification.
AGGRESSIVE-J NOTES: Split off from the original 'aggressive'roleset by Julia for unification.
